name: part_008
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】Attention Please!! Special Tea Party with Pavolia Reine!!! #PavoliaReine3D [aBgFX_2oIU4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Pavolia Reine performs 'cleaning' poses with a duster (hataki) for Subaru and Towa.
Reine interacts with Subaru and Towa, trying out various cute and 'dangerous' poses with her 3D model.
Reine bids farewell to the JP senpais and welcomes members from Hololive English.
The EN guests (Gawr Gura, Mori Calliope, and IRyS) introduce themselves.
Reine takes screenshot requests from the EN girls, leading to some unexpected and humorous poses.

subtitles.original:
えっと、ママっぽい... はたきでお掃除しながら...
Please say ara ara please.
subtitles.english:
Um, like a mom... while cleaning with a duster...
Please say 'ara-ara' please.

subtitles.original: あのね... あ...
subtitles.english: Well... ah...

subtitles.original:
Cleaning... ah... ara ara...
It's time to お掃除！
subtitles.english:
Cleaning... ah... ara ara...
It's time to clean!

subtitles.original:
Yeah! Thank you beautiful Reine!
You're number one! Beautiful! Yay!
subtitles.english:
Yeah! Thank you beautiful Reine!
You're number one! Beautiful! Yay!

subtitles.original:
イェーイ！ 他にはポーズありますか？
Do you have any poses?
subtitles.english:
Yay! Do you have any other poses?
Do you have any other?

subtitles.original:
あ、じゃあトワは...
スバルちゃんをはたきでどっかやってほしいです。
subtitles.english:
Ah, then Towa...
wants you to swat Subaru-chan away with the duster.

subtitles.original: なんでそこなんですか！？
subtitles.english: Why does it turn out like that!?

subtitles.original: なんで！？
subtitles.english: Why!?

subtitles.original: スバルクリーニングでプリーズ。
subtitles.english: Subaru cleaning, please.

subtitles.original: Subaru cleaning?
subtitles.english: Subaru cleaning?

subtitles.original:
Subaru cleaning? Okay...
Subaru cleaning! Please be a bird please!
subtitles.english:
Subaru cleaning? Okay...
Subaru cleaning! Please be a bird please!

subtitles.original:
Okay, okay... It is good, cleaning is good, right?
Okay, thank you.
subtitles.english:
Okay, okay... It is good, cleaning is good, right?
Okay, thank you.

subtitles.original: 可愛い。
subtitles.english: Cute.

subtitles.original:
可愛い。待って、ちょっと...
はたきで可愛いポーズしてみて。
subtitles.english:
Cute. Wait, a sec...
try doing a cute pose with the duster.

subtitles.original: はたきと一緒に可愛いポーズ。
subtitles.english: A cute pose together with the duster.

subtitles.original: めっちゃ難しそう。
subtitles.english: That looks really difficult.

subtitles.original: むずいよ。むずいよ。
subtitles.english: It's hard. It's hard.

subtitles.original: これ？ これ... これ可愛い？ Cute pose.
subtitles.english: This? This... is this cute? Cute pose.

subtitles.original: ちょっと卑しいですそれ... あ、違う...
subtitles.english: That's a bit vulgar... ah, no...

subtitles.original: いいのよ。いいのよやって。思うが...
subtitles.english: It's fine. It's fine, do it. As you think...

subtitles.original: いやそれやばい！ やばい！
subtitles.english: No, that's dangerous! Dangerous!

subtitles.original: やばい？ え？
subtitles.english: Dangerous? Eh?

subtitles.original:
いやちょっとなんかもうその...
ボディがすごいナイスバディすぎるわ。
subtitles.english:
No, wait, like...
your body is just such a "nice body".

subtitles.original: ボディしか見てないやん！ ごめん。
subtitles.english: You're only looking at her body! Sorry.

subtitles.original: 内なるおじさん出てるごめん。
subtitles.english: My inner old man is coming out, sorry.

subtitles.original: やばい... やばすぎる。やば...
subtitles.english: Dangerous... it's too dangerous. Dange...

subtitles.original: え、どうすればいいですか？
subtitles.english: Eh, what should I do?

subtitles.original: ちょっと背中みたいな。
subtitles.english: I want to see your back a bit.

subtitles.original: 背中？ 背中...
subtitles.english: Back? Back...

subtitles.original:
うわぁぁ！ Please say ara ara!
Please say ara ara! あ、あらあら！
subtitles.english:
Whoaaa! Please say ara ara!
Please say ara ara! Ah, ara ara!

subtitles.original:
You are number one Reine! Thank you!
Okayですか？ Thank you!
subtitles.english:
You are number one Reine! Thank you!
Are you okay? Thank you!

subtitles.original:
Okayですか？ Thank you so much!
ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english:
Is that okay? Thank you so much!
Thank you very much!

subtitles.original:
ありがとう！ 嬉しい！
今度何かやりましょうね、一緒に！
subtitles.english:
Thank you! I'm happy!
Let's do something together next time!

subtitles.original:
おめでとう、レイネ！ またね！
Bye bye! ありがとう！
subtitles.english:
Congratulations, Reine! See you!
Bye bye! Thank you!

subtitles.original:
Yay! そして... that was Towa-senpai and Subaru-senpai
from Hololive JP, my senpais.
subtitles.english:
Yay! And so... that was Towa-senpai and Subaru-senpai
from Hololive JP, my senpais.

subtitles.original: Senpai, senpai... I'm so happy many many people coming.
subtitles.english: Senpai, senpai... I'm so happy many many people coming.

subtitles.original:
えーま、and then, some girls from the
EN branch are also here.
subtitles.english:
Well, and then, some girls from the
EN branch are also here.

subtitles.original:
ENからも来てくれましたね。
もしもし、hello.
subtitles.english:
They also came from EN.
Hello, hello.

subtitles.original:
Yay! Hello! Hello hello!
Oh wait, I need to hide this! Hosh hosh hosh!
subtitles.english:
Yay! Hello! Hello hello!
Oh wait, I need to hide this! Hosh hosh hosh!

subtitles.original:
Looking good! Shove it somewhere secret!
Secret secret hataki magic!
subtitles.english:
Looking good! Shove it somewhere secret!
Secret secret hataki magic!

subtitles.original:
Yay! Please introduce yourselves,
Gura, Calli, and IRyS!
subtitles.english:
Yay! Please introduce yourselves,
Gura, Calli, and IRyS!

subtitles.original: Not me, I'm not first. Nose goes!
subtitles.english: Not me, I'm not first. Nose goes!

subtitles.original:
ド、ド、ド、ドモサメです！
I'm Gawr Gura from Hololive English! Yay!
subtitles.english:
D-D-D-Domosame-desu!
I'm Gawr Gura from Hololive English! Yay!

subtitles.original:
I'm Mori... Kill-a-people, kill-a-mori from
Hololive English! Yeah let's go! Desu-desu-desu!
subtitles.english:
I'm Mori... Kill-a-people, kill-a-mori from
Hololive English! Yeah let's go! Desu-desu-desu!

subtitles.original: And I'm IRyS! Hi-RyS, it's IRyS! Hi Reine!
subtitles.english: And I'm IRyS! Hi-RyS, it's IRyS! Hi Reine!

subtitles.original: Hi hi! Thank you so much for coming today!
subtitles.english: Hi hi! Thank you so much for coming today!

subtitles.original:
And so what we're going to do is I'm accepting requests
from you for screenshot time. I'll do any pose for you.
subtitles.english:
And so what we're going to do is I'm accepting requests
from you for screenshot time. I'll do any pose for you.

subtitles.original:
Alright, I'll go first. I'll go ahead and make it easy,
rip the band-aid off. Show us your panties.
subtitles.english:
Alright, I'll go first. I'll go ahead and make it easy,
rip the band-aid off. Show us your panties.

subtitles.original: HO! What!? Calli!
subtitles.english: HO! What!? Calli!

subtitles.original:
Just do it! Just... What!?
It's what they want to see!
subtitles.english:
Just do it! Just... What!?
It's what they want to see!

subtitles.original:
Ah... Hear me out, that's why I was
thinking kicky-kicky-kick.
subtitles.english:
Ah... Hear me out, that's why I was
thinking kicky-kicky-kick.

subtitles.original: Calli, is this what you're always thinking?
subtitles.english: Calli, is this what you're always thinking?

subtitles.original: No, I'm just thinking about the fans! Oh! Whoa!
subtitles.english: No, I'm just thinking about the fans! Oh! Whoa!

subtitles.original:
Whoa whoa! What just happened? I saw the magic!
I've seen behind the curtain!
subtitles.english:
Whoa whoa! What just happened? I saw the magic!
I've seen behind the curtain!

subtitles.original:
Suddenly I don't remember anything!
What? Spaghetti beam!
subtitles.english:
Suddenly I don't remember anything!
What? Spaghetti beam!

subtitles.original: Anyways, what's next?
subtitles.english: Anyways, what's next?

subtitles.original: I want to see a close-up of your ribs.
subtitles.english: I want to see a close-up of your ribs.

subtitles.original: My this? This? Ribs?
subtitles.english: My this? This? Ribs?

subtitles.original:
Ribs! Close up! Oh man, and
waki-pai at the same time!
subtitles.english:
Ribs! Close up! Oh man, and
waki-pai at the same time!

subtitles.original:
It's a double-decker! That's not even allowed!
My! Whoa whoa!
subtitles.english:
It's a double-decker! That's not even allowed!
My! Whoa whoa!

subtitles.original: Gura, how do you not have those? Are those like gills?
subtitles.english: Gura, how do you not have those? Are those like gills?

subtitles.original:
Gills? No! Do you have those?
What the hell? Gills?
subtitles.english:
Gills? No! Do you have those?
What the hell? Gills?

subtitles.original:
Okay! Any more requests? I got something
to show you too actually after this.
subtitles.english:
Okay! Any more requests? I got something
to show you too actually after this.
